abstract: The Carlyle Group is near a deal to buy Johnson & Johnson’s clinical testing arm for about $4.1 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Wednesday.
snippet: The Carlyle Group is near a deal to buy Johnson & Johnson’s clinical testing arm for about $4.1 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: The Carlyle Group has all but clinched a deal to buy Johnson & Johnson’s clinical testing arm for about $4.1 billion after several weeks of negotiations, a person briefed on the matter said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Carlyle Said to Strike Deal for Johnson & Johnson Testing Division

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
